nl_problem:
# Task: Nested Logic Test (Depth 4)
# Interface:
Class: Solution
Method: checkNested(self, x0: int, x1: int, x2: int, x3: int) -> bool

# Objective:
This is a test of structural nesting. Return True ONLY if all the following conditions are met:
1. x0 is greater than 0
2. x1 is greater than 0
3. x2 is greater than 0
4. x3 is greater than 0

Each condition must be checked inside the previous one (nested if statements).
lisp_spec:
(task
  (name "checkNested")
  (signature ((x0 int) (x1 int) (x2 int) (x3 int)) bool)
  (constraints
    (constraint "All input values must be integers.")
  )
  (goal
    (description "Determine if all input values are greater than zero using nested conditions.")
    (rule "Check if x0 is greater than 0. If true, proceed to check if x1 is greater than 0.")
    (rule "If x1 is greater than 0, proceed to check if x2 is greater than 0.")
    (rule "If x2 is greater than 0, proceed to check if x3 is greater than 0.")
    (return "Return True if all conditions are met; otherwise, return False.")
  )
)
